review.title: “Good”
review.pros: Pros – Family oriented business, family owned , nice people. Health coverage is good and free for single employees and very affordable for employees with families. Good equipment all newer late model trucks.
review.cons: Cons – Due to the nature of the work, fueling oil and gas industry the hours are 24/7 also alot of time away from home not good for someone with a family if you want to see your kids grow up...
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
